Room.Name: Lyanden Road
Room.ShortDescription: You are west of a gulley where a stream of water flows from north to south.
Room.LongDescription: the Lyanden Road was built only a few years ago, but there is another way to travel between the eastern cities and Oceancrest. Long ago, a caravan trail was established, and it is still in use, but it lies far to the south. The caravan trail is not considered safe for lone travelers.
